title: CUDA initialization hangs on CUDA 9
body_html:
I just installed pytorch HEAD from source with cuda 9 and cudnn 7 using gcc 5.4 on ubuntu 16.04. It seemed to build and install without issue, however the python process hangs if I try to move a tensor to gpu using the cuda method. The following snippet also hangs.

import torch

torch._C._cuda_init()

There are 2 Maxwell Titan X and 2 Pascal 1080 Ti cards attached to the machine.
